comments.author: Kevin Peck
comments.content:
After having just written a big Mac / IB / Xcode rant today on my blog I pretty much agree with you 100%. I am doing OK with the monitor on my Macbook pro but had to get a real mouse. Xcode can really piss you off at times especially that HOME / END key processing.

Interface Builder happens to be a big pile of shit. It may allow you to layout the controls but then you have to tweak the hell out of things and God forbid you want to do both portrait and landscape layouts. For the people who feel they are the GOD of UI Interface Builder is a slap in the face.

comments.author: randy
comments.content: I should note that XCode 4 did improve on a lot of things that annoyed me one way or the other in 3. It's still a far cry from Eclipse though.
